description: A React functional component that implements a timer page for a speech timer application. It displays speech details and manages a countdown timer with start, stop, and reset controls, styled dynamically based on elapsed time.

methods.name: handleStart
methods.description: Starts the timer by setting the 'running' state to true.

methods.name: handleStop
methods.description: Stops the timer by setting the 'running' state to false.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the timer to zero and stops it.
